input.sentences: tonight was the fundraiser at school . we each had to purchase a ticket and all the extras to participate in the event .
here is the cooking stuff all ready for the `` chefs . '' the rooms looks good !
the children are all ready to begin their meals . they have been looking forward to the event for a while .
here is a student that is mixing her ingredients . she has already measured out her portions .
here is a teacher helping out a parent . this is a fun event . i hope we do this next year too !
